The development and testing of new drugs

New drugA substance that can change chemical reactions in the body. need to be tested and trialled before doctors prescribe them and patients take them. This allows drugs to be checked for:
• None The most effective amount of drug needed to cure the disease.

This is important as some drugs are toxicPoisonous., and have other side effects that might be harmful to people

This is also known as efficacyThe ability of a drug to cure a condition or relieve symptoms., and checks how well the drug cures the disease, or improves symptoms.

This varies, and has to be closely controlled, as too high a concentration might be toxic.
